title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, October 23, 2019
description: On this day in 1920, Sinclair Lewis's novel “Main Street," about a young city woman who moves to a small town, was published.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1920, Sinclair Lewis's novel “Main Street," about a young city woman who moves to a small town, was published.
